title: I need help :/
body: My client will crash as soon as i go to enter the game. Can't reconnect, and I can't log off and try to reconnect either. I'm not sure what's wrong but I know it started doing it after Camille came out, not blaming it on that, that's just when the problem occurred.

replies.body: Are you seeing a specific error message when this crash happens, or is there a specific behavior that prevents you from relogging and trying to reconnect?
